message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of immense value to your business. While I understand this is a significant investment, I'm confident it will pay dividends in the long run. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,150,000, which is a substantial discount from its true worth. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
